author: chris-dollin
msg: Reification changes: added extra mapping to BuiltinPersonalities.
Changes to allow canSupport(Class t) to Polymorphic nodes, and the
consequences of that. Also possibly unsound isValid to check if a

author: chris-dollin
msg: IteratorFactory - removed dead argument from constructor call.
ModelCom, StatementImpl - changes to support reification.
SeqNodIteratorfactoryImpl - removed dead argument from constrctor call.

author: chris-dollin
msg: All these revised to use ClosableWrapper (and hence they shrank).

author: chris-dollin
msg: (a) the new Reification interface; models and statements can
create ReifiedStatement objects, tests to see if statements are
reified, and models can list reified statements
(b) extending the polymorphic API with canAs(T) to see if a RDFNode
can be viewed as an instance of T.
